description.part1: Rentos Group is an investment and development company. Its key areas of activity are:
description.part2: Today, the company owns and manages a diversified portfolio of properties covering over 40,000 sq.m.
description.objects: Among them: ZLATA PLAZA shopping mall and Pokrovskyi shopping center, FORT logistics complex, as well as office properties and street retail facilities in Rivne and the Slon shopping center in Lutsk.
